summary: The 'Preventing and Identifying Lasting Operational TBI Act' (PILOT Act) directs the Secretary of Defense to submit a report to Congress regarding traumatic brain injuries (TBIs) among active-duty pilots. The report will assess the prevalence of TBIs related to high-speed maneuvers, catapult launches, and other potentially harmful actions. It will also include existing policies for identifying and treating TBIs, a strategy for improvement, and recommendations for regulatory or legislative actions.
